Interface ValueIndiceHandle

All Superinterfaces:
ValueHandle
All Known Implementing Classes:
ComboIndiceGetter, RadioGetter
public interface ValueIndiceHandle
extends ValueHandle

Class that binds to a component that allows for multiple selections and returns either the value or the index of the selected value.

Author:
René Ghosh 20 mars 2005
